mapper.update: update ypxs set empno = #{empno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ckid = #{ckid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cusid = #{cusid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, xsdh = #{xsdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xstate = #{xstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xsnum = #{xsnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cksta = #{cksta,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xsdate = #{xsdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where xsid = #{xsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select xsid, empno, ckid, cusid, xsdh, xstate, xsnum, cksta, xsdate from ypxs
